goal.en: Learn basic concepts on stress, strain, and generalized Hooke‘s law from mathematic derivations, rock mechanic experiments, and computer softwares, and build up fundamental knowledge for future core courses like Seismology and Structural Geology.
goal.ch: 本課程主要目標，在透過數學推導（主要是tensor）及實驗方法（簡單的岩石力學實驗或電腦展現），訓練學生認識應力(stress)、應變(strain)、及虎克定律(generalized Hooke‘s law)等彈性體力學的基本概念，建立大三「地震學」、「構造地質學」等必修課的基礎知識。

content.en: Will cover topics on stress, Mohr‘s circleof stress, strain and deformation, and generalized Hooke‘s law in tensor forms.If time permits, further topics like Coulomb failure criteria and Anderson‘s theory of faulting will be taught.
content.ch: 本課程主要教授彈性體力學，包括形變(應變及位移)、應力、elastic constitutive relations (即虎克定律的一般形式)，並將使用基礎張量(tensor)分析來簡化三維數學形式。最後你(妳)會發現傳說已久的地震體波(body waves, 即P及S波)原來是這麼來的....若時間許可，將介紹應力及應變在材料(對我們而言就是岩石)破壞力學上的涵義。例如庫倫破裂條件(Coulomb failure criteria)、莫氏圓(Mohr‘s circle)、及Anderson‘s theory of faulting等。以後若在野外地質調查時看到斷層，要想想它們背後的物理及數學喔！

textbook.en: 教科書:Chou P. C. and N. J. Pagano (1992), Elasticity: Tensor, Dyadic, and Engineering Approaches, Dover Publications, New York, 290 pp. 參考書:Gudmundsson, A. (2011), Rock Fracture in Geological Processes, Cambridge University Press, New York, 578 pp. Twiss, R. J. and E. M. Moores (1992), Structural Geology, 2nd ed., W. H. Freeman, New York, 532 pp.
